com.viaoa.html

Class OAComboBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.html.OAHtmlComponent
      • com.viaoa.html.OAComboBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OAComboBox
extends OAHtmlComponent
    OAComboBox that uses a masterHub and another hub with all of the values to use. 
        [Java Code]
    Hub hubState = oasession.getHub("stringstate").createSharedHub();
    hubState.setLink(hubJob,"state");
    OAComboBox cbo = new OAComboBox(hubState, "name");
    cbo.setNullDescription(null);
    form.add("cboState",cbo);
    ....
    [HTML Code]
    <select name="cboState"> <%=form.getComboBox("cboState").getOptions()%> </select>
    output =>
    <select name="cboState" ><option value="1" selected>Texas</option></select>

    -- JavaScript to Automatically cause form to submit:
    <select name="cboState" onChange="forms[0].submit();" >

    
    ... sample for creating a recursive listing that is linked to another hub
    Hub hubProduct = oasession.getHub("Product"); // hub that is going to be linked to
    Hub hubTop = oaapplication.getHub("Category").createSharedHub();  // categories without parentCategory (top Hub)
    Hub hub = new Hub(Category.class);  // hub that comboBox will use
    hub.setRecursiveHub(hubTop);
    hub.setLink(hubProduct); 

    OAComboBox cbo = new OAComboBox(hub, "name");
    cbo.setNullDescription("Top Level");
    form.add("cboCategory", cbo);
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • OAComboBox

        public OAComboBox(com.viaoa.hub.Hub masterHub,
                  com.viaoa.hub.Hub linkHub,
                  String propertyPath,
                  int columns)
        This will call hub.setLink(linkHub). Note: if hub is not a Shared Hub, then one will be created and it will be used.
        Parameters:
        masterHub - hub that is used for listing
        linkHub - hub to update
        propertyPath - property to display

      • getOptions

        public String getOptions()
        returns the string needed for "option" tags.

      • getOptions

        public String getOptions(String strSelectValue)
        returns the string needed for "option" tags.
        Parameters:
        strSelectValue, - if null (default), then the hub will be used to set "select" item. Else, strSelectValue will be used to compare against items displayed. Note: if strSelectValue is not null, then the activeObject will not be set. It can be used to set to value of a textField by creating an OATextField and using its name for the ComboBox "name" tag. The textfield will then be updated on submit.

      • getHtml

        public String getHtml(String htmlTags)
        Overrides:
        getHtml in class OAHtmlComponent
        Parameters:
        htmlTags - extra tags to insert into html output. These tags will come before any other generated tag.
